alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Palm Beach County through 630 PM EDT... At 553 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Boynton Beach, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boca Raton, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Lake Worth, Palm Beach, Highland Beach, Ocean Ridge, Greenacres, Palm Springs, Lantana, Atlantis, Village Of Golf, Kings Point, Dunes Road, Hypoluxo, South Palm Beach, Gulf Stream, Briny Breezes, Manalapan and Aberdeen. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
